text: Yes, exactly - the #TBVaccine is old and cheap - ask if you can get that, if you're waiting for a long time for the #CovidVaccine - you can most likely do both, safely, and the old TB vaccine is #TriedAndTrue - same with the VERY easy low-dose #Chloroquine (children's version)💊 https://t.co/c7OxSN5zc0 https://t.co/bNHvE577FU
